metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41165 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: CKEditor4 is an open source WYSIWYG HTML editor. In affected version avulnerability has been discovered in the core HTML processing module andmay affect all plugins used by CKEditor 4. The vulnerability allowed toinject malformed comments HTML bypassing content sanitization, which couldresult in executing JavaScript code. It affects all users using theCKEditor 4 at version < 4.17.0. The problem has been recognized andpatched. The fix will be available in version 4.17.0.

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
ldap-account-manager package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
request-tracker4 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
